scripts.test:e2e: E2E_WEB_PORT=5174 E2E_WORKER_PORT=8788 pnpm -w exec playwright test --config /Users/jd/src/wodbrains/playwright.config.ts
scripts.test:readme: E2E_WEB_PORT=5174 E2E_WORKER_PORT=8788 pnpm -w exec playwright test --config /Users/jd/src/wodbrains/playwright.readme.config.ts
scripts.test:live-evals: set -a && . "apps/worker/.dev.vars" && set +a && RUN_LIVE_AI_TESTS=1 pnpm --filter worker test -- test/parse.evals.test.ts test/parse.gemini.test.ts
scripts.dev: concurrently -n web,worker -c magenta,cyan "pnpm --filter web dev" "pnpm --filter worker dev"
scripts.check: pnpm typecheck && pnpm lint && pnpm format:check
scripts.deploy: pnpm --filter web run build && pnpm --filter worker run deploy
